mapper.select: SELECT uf.id, uf.file_name, uf.file_path, uf.content_type, uf.size, uf.save_file_name, uf.reg_date FROM upload_file uf WHERE uf.id = #{id}
select uf.id, uf.file_name, uf.file_path, uf.content_type, uf.size, uf.save_file_name, uf.reg_date from file_map fm left join upload_file uf on fm.file_id = uf.id where fm.board_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO upload_file( file_name, file_path, content_type, save_file_name, size, reg_date ) VALUES( #{fileName}, #{filePath}, #{contentType}, #{saveFileName}, #{size}, NOW() )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM upload_file WHERE id = #{id}; DELETE FROM file_map WHERE file_id = #{id};
